lead_paragraph: Guillermo Cañas of Argentina, a wild card, upset top-seeded Juan Carlos Ferrero of Spain, 7-6 (4), 6-2, yesterday in the final of the Brazil Open in Costa do Sauipe for his first tournament victory since returning from a 15-month doping ban.
snippet: Guillermo Cañas of Argentina, a wild card, upset top-seeded Juan Carlos Ferrero of Spain, 7-6 (4), 6-2, yesterday in the final of the Brazil Open in Costa do Sauipe for his first tournament victory since returning from a 15-month doping ban.
